subject: FIXED: 11 users updated - can now see events when logged in
body:
Team,

Applied data fix to 11 users who couldn't see events when logged in.

## WHAT I DID

Updated 11 users in PROD with:

```javascript
mapCenter: {
  lat: 42.4072,      // Worcester, MA (center of state)
  lng: -71.3824,
  radiusMiles: 200,  // Covers all of New England
  zoom: 8
}

localUserInfo.userDefaults: {
  defaultZoomRange: 200,
  useCenterLocation: false
}
```

## USERS FIXED

**Elana** was fixed separately (already working).

## WHY THIS WORKS

The frontend bug checks if `userDefaults` exists before fetching events. By adding `userDefaults` to these users, they now pass the check and can see events.

## VERIFICATION

- 0 users now missing `userDefaults` (except Elana who was fixed differently)
- Keith Baldwin spot-checked: mapCenter + userDefaults present ✅

## STILL NEEDED

1. Sarah's frontend fix (commit bd5df9a) should still be deployed to prevent future users from having this issue
2. Long-term: Consolidate to single location system

— Fulton
